casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eddie Lamar TAYLOR. No. 719A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 12, 2006. Anne M. Gomez, Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defenders, for Eddie Lamar Taylor. William Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of December 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to serve proposed record on appeal:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant shall have up to and including the 2nd day of January 2007 to serve his/her proposed record upon the district attorney. The parties shall then proceed to settle and file the record on appeal pursuant to the provisions of Appellate Rules 11 and 12. By order of the Court In conference this the 12th day of December 2006."
